title: Web 2.0-Based Science Learning Network Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners access Web 2.0 tools (e.g., collaborative platforms, social bookmarking) and VR simulations via smartphones, aiming to build personal knowledge networks

learning_goals: Learners can construct personal knowledge networks related to scientific topics using Web 2.0 tools.
Learners can engage in collaborative learning activities to solve scientific problems in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can apply digital content evaluation criteria to select and share reliable scientific information.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
